<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<hr style="color:#999999;height:3px;width:100%" />


<div style="text-align:center"><div style="width:8.5in;text-align:left;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto">
 <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold">Item&#160;7.01. Regulation FD Disclosure. </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and subsidiaries (collectively, &#8220;we,&#8221; &#8220;our&#8221; or &#8220;Mondel&#275;z International&#8221;) are furnishing this current report to provide supplemental <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial information related to the retrospective impact of our participation in a secondary offering of Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (&#8220;KDP&#8221;) shares on November&#160;17, 2020. We sold approximately 40.0&#160;million shares, which reduced our ownership interest by 2.8% to 8.4% of the total outstanding shares. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Due to our reporting of KDP&#8217;s results on a <span style="white-space:nowrap">one-quarter</span> lag basis, the impact of the sale of these shares will affect our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results beginning with our first quarter ended March&#160;31, 2021. Consistent with our definitions of our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial measures, we will reflect this partial sale of our equity method investment in KDP as a divestiture, resulting in the recasting of our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results for all quarters of 2020, 2019 and 2018 and for the years ended December&#160;31, 2020, 2019 and 2018. </p> <p style="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold"><span style="font-style:italic">Change to our Historical <span style="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</span> Financial Results in Connection with our Sales of KDP shares </span></p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">As previously disclosed in our Annual Report on Form <span style="white-space:nowrap">10-K</span> for the year ended December&#160;31, 2020, we participated in a secondary offering of KDP shares on November&#160;17, 2020. We sold approximately 40.0&#160;million shares, which reduced our ownership interest by 2.8% to 8.4% of the total outstanding shares. We received $1,132&#160;million of proceeds and recorded a <span style="white-space:nowrap">pre-tax</span> gain of $459&#160;million (or $350&#160;million <span style="white-space:nowrap">after-tax)</span> during the fourth quarter of 2020. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">We consider the 2.8% ownership reduction, resulting from this sale of shares, a partial sale of our equity method investment in KDP. Consistent with our definitions of our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial measures, we consider this sale to be a divestiture. Due to our reporting of KDP&#8217;s results on a <span style="white-space:nowrap">one-quarter</span> lag basis, the impact of the sale of these shares will affect our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results beginning with the first quarter ended March&#160;31, 2021. Therefore, we will remove the equity method investment net earnings results related to this partial sale of our equity method investment in KDP from our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results for Adjusted EPS for all historical periods presented. Our U.S. GAAP results, which include our historical equity method investment net earnings from KDP, will not change from what was previously reported. </p> <p style="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold"><span style="font-style:italic">Recast Amounts Reflecting Changes in Historical <span style="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</span> Results </span></p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The change to our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results for Adjusted EPS described above does not affect our previously reported consolidated financial results nor does it affect our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results for Organic Net Revenue, Adjusted Gross Profit or Adjusted Operating Income for any period. This supplemental disclosure does not amend any disclosure contained in any of our prior SEC filings. See the chart below and Exhibit 99.1 for the unaudited GAAP and recast <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial information for all quarters of 2020, 2019 and 2018 and for the years ended December&#160;31, 2020, 2019 and 2018. </p> <p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p>

<div style="text-align:center"><div style="width:8.5in;text-align:left;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto">
 <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold"><span style="font-style:italic">Financial Schedules </span></p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Exhibit 99.1 to this Form <span style="white-space:nowrap">8-K</span> contains financial schedules that provide the reconciliations for our recast <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial results for Adjusted EPS due to the partial sale of our equity method investment in KDP for all quarters of 2020, 2019 and 2018 and for the years ended December&#160;31, 2020, 2019 and 2018. </p> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p>
<table style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt;border:0;width:100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td style="width:3%;vertical-align:top" align="left">&#8226;</td>
<td style="width:1%;vertical-align:top">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" style="vertical-align:top"> <p style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt;text-align:left">Schedule 1 provides reconciliations of the differences between the recast Adjusted <span style="white-space:nowrap">(non-GAAP)</span> financial measures and their most directly comparable reported (GAAP) financial measures. Equity method investment net earnings and Provision for income taxes are components used to calculate net earnings and diluted earnings per share attributable to Mondel&#275;z International. </p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p>
<table style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt;border:0;width:100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td style="width:3%;vertical-align:top" align="left">&#8226;</td>
<td style="width:1%;vertical-align:top">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" style="vertical-align:top"> <p style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt;text-align:left">Schedule 2 provides reconciliations between the reported diluted EPS attributable to Mondel&#275;z International (GAAP) and the recast Adjusted EPS <span style="white-space:nowrap">(non-GAAP).</span> </p></td></tr></table> <p style="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold"><span style="font-style:italic"><span style="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</span> Financial Measures </span></p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">We use <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial information and believe it is useful to investors as it provides additional information to facilitate comparisons of historical operating results and identify trends in our underlying operating results, and it provides additional insight and transparency on how we evaluate our business. For additional information regarding our <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</span> financial measures, see Exhibit 99.2. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold">Item&#160;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits. </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) The following exhibits are being furnished with this Current Report on Form <span style="white-space:nowrap">8-K.</span> </p> <p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><B>Exhibit 99.1 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>U.S. GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Reconciliations </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">In addition to reporting our U.S. GAAP operating results, we have historically reported <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial information.
Refer also to our Quarterly Reports on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> and our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the periods presented for additional information on our GAAP to <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> adjustments. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 1.a </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Net Earnings and Tax Rate </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>(in millions of U.S. dollars and shares, except per share data) </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:9pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>Adjusted <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">(Non-GAAP)</FONT></B></P></TD>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:9pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(1)</SUP>&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Taxes were computed for each of the items excluded from the company&#146;s GAAP results based on the facts and
tax assumptions associated with each item. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

tax assumptions associated with each item. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 1.h </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:9pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>Adjusted <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">(Non-GAAP)</FONT></B></P></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1.00pt solid #000000"><B>Operating<BR>Income</B></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1.00pt solid #000000"><B>Benefit<BR><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">plan&nbsp;non-</FONT></B><br><B>service<BR>expense /<BR>(income)</B></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" NOWRAP ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1.00pt solid #000000"><B>Operating<BR>Income</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" NOWRAP ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1.00pt solid #000000"><B>Benefit<BR>plan<BR><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-service</FONT><BR>expense /<BR>(income)</B></TD>

<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><B>)%&nbsp;</B></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Simplify to Grow Program</P></TD>

<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 2.f </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Diluted EPS </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited)

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 2.k </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Diluted EPS </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited)
</B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="6" ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1.00pt solid #000000"><B>For&nbsp;the&nbsp;Twelve&nbsp;Months</B><br><B>Ended&nbsp;December&nbsp;31,</B></TD>

</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-99.2
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>d311838dex992.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-99.2
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>EX-99.2</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><B>Exhibit 99.2 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Financial Measures &#150; Additional Information </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">We use <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial information and believe it is useful to investors as it provides additional information to
facilitate comparisons of historical operating results, identify trends in our underlying operating results, and provide additional insight and transparency on how we evaluate our business. We use <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT>
financial measures to budget, make operating and strategic decisions and evaluate our performance. We have detailed below the adjustments that we make in our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measure that was affected by
this partial sale of an equity method investment. Our adjustments generally fall within the following categories: acquisition&nbsp;&amp; divestiture activities, gains and losses on intangible asset sales and
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-cash</FONT> impairments, major program restructuring activities, constant currency and related adjustments, major program financing and hedging activities and other major items affecting comparability of
operating results. We believe the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> measures should always be considered along with the related U.S. GAAP financial measures. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The definitions of our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures did not change because of this partial sale of an equity method
investment. For all periods presented in this Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">8-K,</FONT> our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measure Adjusted EPS is defined below. As new events or circumstances arise, this
definition could change over time. When definitions change, we provide the updated definitions and present the related <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> historical results on a comparable basis <SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(1)</SUP>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><I>Adjusted EPS</I> &#150; defined as diluted EPS attributable to Mondel&#275;z
International from continuing operations excluding the impacts of the Simplify to Grow Program <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(2)</SUP>; gains or losses (including <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-cash</FONT> impairment charges)
on goodwill and intangible assets; net earnings from divestitures <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>; divestiture <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>&nbsp;or acquisition gains or losses and related
divestiture <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>, acquisition and integration costs; remeasurement of net monetary position <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(4)</SUP>; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">mark-to-market</FONT></FONT> impacts from commodity and forecasted currency transaction derivative contracts <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(5)</SUP>; impacts from resolution of tax matters <SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(6)</SUP>; CEO transition remuneration <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(7)</SUP>; impact from pension participation changes <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(8)</SUP>;
incremental expenses related to the 2017 malware incident; losses on debt extinguishment and related expenses; gains or losses on interest rate swaps no longer designated as accounting cash flow hedges due to changed financing and hedging plans;
gains or losses on equity method investment transactions; costs associated with the JDE Peet&#146;s transaction; and U.S. and Swiss tax reform discrete impacts <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(9)</SUP>. Similarly, within Adjusted EPS,
our equity method investment net earnings exclude our proportionate share of our investees&#146; significant operating and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-operating</FONT> items <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(10)</SUP>. We
believe that Adjusted EPS provides improved comparability of underlying operating results. We also evaluate growth in our Adjusted EPS on a constant currency </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">basis <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(11)</SUP>. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(1)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">When items no longer impact our current or future presentation of
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> operating results, we remove these items from our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> definitions. During 2020, we added to the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT>
definitions the exclusion of costs associated with the JDE Peet&#146;s transaction. Refer to Note 7, <I>Equity Method Investments,</I> and Note 16, <I>Income Taxes</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for
the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2020 for more information on the JDE Peet&#146;s transaction. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(2)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> adjustments related to the Simplify to Grow Program reflect
costs incurred that relate to the objectives of our program to transform our supply chain network and organizational structure. Costs that do not meet the program objectives are not reflected in the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT>
adjustments. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(3)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Divestitures include completed sales of businesses (including the partial or full sale of an equity method
investment) and exits of major product lines upon completion of a sale or licensing agreement. As we record our share of KDP and JDE Peet&#146;s ongoing earnings on a <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">one-quarter</FONT> lag basis, any KDP or JDE
Peet&#146;s ownership reductions are reflected as divestiture within our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> results the following quarter. Refer to Note 2, <I>Divestitures and Acquisitions</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2020 for more information on divestitures and acquisitions impacting the comparability of our results. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(4)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">During the third quarter of 2018, as we began to apply highly inflationary accounting for Argentina, we
excluded the remeasurement gains or losses related to remeasuring net monetary assets or liabilities in Argentina during the period to be consistent with our prior accounting for these remeasurement gains/losses for Venezuela when it was subject to
highly inflationary accounting prior to 2016. Refer to Note 1, <I>Summary of Significant Accounting Policies</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2020 for additional
information. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(5)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">During the third quarter of 2016, we began to exclude unrealized gains and losses <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">(mark-to-market</FONT></FONT> impacts) from outstanding commodity and forecasted currency transaction derivatives from our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> earnings measures
until such time that the related exposures impact our operating results. Since we purchase commodity and forecasted currency contracts to mitigate price volatility primarily for inventory requirements in future periods, we made this adjustment to
remove the volatility of these future inventory purchases on current operating results to facilitate comparisons of our underlying operating performance across periods. We also </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="13%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
discontinued designating commodity and forecasted currency transaction derivatives for hedge accounting treatment. To facilitate comparisons of our underlying operating results, we have recast
all historical <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> earnings measures to exclude the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">mark-to-market</FONT></FONT> impacts. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(6)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Refer to Note 14, <I>Commitments and Contingencies &#150; Tax Matters, </I>in our Annual Report on Form <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2020 for additional information. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(7)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">On November&nbsp;20, 2017, Dirk Van de Put succeeded Irene Rosenfeld as CEO of Mondel&#275;z International in
advance of her retirement at the end of March 2018. In order to incent Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put to join us, we provided him compensation with a total combined target value of $42.5&nbsp;million to make him whole for incentive awards he forfeited or
grants that were not made to him when he left his former employer. The compensation we granted took the form of cash, deferred stock units, performance share units and stock options. In connection with Irene Rosenfeld&#146;s retirement, we made her
outstanding grants of performance share units for the 2016-2018 and 2017-2019 performance cycles eligible for continued vesting and approved a $0.5&nbsp;million salary for her service as Chairman from January through March 2018. We refer to these
elements of Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put&#146;s and Ms.&nbsp;Rosenfeld&#146;s compensation arrangements together as &#147;CEO transition remuneration.&#148; We are excluding amounts we expense as CEO transition remuneration from our 2017 and future <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> results because those amounts are not part of our regular compensation program and are incremental to amounts we would have incurred as ongoing CEO compensation. As a result, in 2017, we excluded amounts
expensed for the cash payment to Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put and partial vesting of his equity grants. In 2018, we excluded amounts paid for Ms.&nbsp;Rosenfeld&#146;s service as Chairman and partial vesting of Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put&#146;s and
Ms.&nbsp;Rosenfeld&#146;s equity grants. In 2019, we excluded amounts related to the partial vesting of Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put&#146;s equity grants. During the first quarter of 2020, Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put&#146;s equity grants became fully vested.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(8)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The impact from pension participation changes represents the charges incurred when employee groups are
withdrawn from multiemployer pension plans and other changes in employee group pension plan participation. We exclude these charges from our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> results because those amounts do not reflect our ongoing
pension obligations. See Note 11, <I>Benefit Plans</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2020 for more information on the multiemployer pension plan withdrawal.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(9)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">We exclude the impact of the 2019 Swiss tax reform and 2017 U.S. tax reform. During the third quarter of 2019,
Swiss Federal and Zurich Cantonal tax events drove our recognition of a Swiss tax reform net benefit to our results of operations. On December&nbsp;22, 2017, the United States enacted tax reform legislation that included a broad range of business
tax provisions. We exclude these tax reform impacts from our Adjusted EPS as they do not reflect our ongoing tax obligations under the new tax reforms. Refer to Note 16, <I>Income Taxes</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2020 for more information on the impact of Swiss and U.S. tax reform. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(10)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">We have excluded our proportionate share of our equity method investees&#146; significant operating and <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-operating</FONT> items, such as acquisition and divestiture related costs, restructuring program costs and discrete U.S. tax reform impacts, in order to provide investors with a comparable view of our performance
across periods. Although we have shareholder rights and board representation commensurate with our ownership interests in our equity method investees and review the underlying operating results and significant operating and <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-operating</FONT> items with them each reporting period, we do not have direct control over their operations or resulting revenue and expenses. Our use of equity method investment net earnings on an adjusted basis is
not intended to imply that we have any such control. Our GAAP &#147;diluted EPS attributable to Mondel&#275;z International from continuing operations&#148; includes all of the investees&#146; significant operating and
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-operating</FONT> items. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(11)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Constant currency operating results are calculated by dividing or multiplying, as appropriate, the
current-period local currency operating results by the currency exchange rates used to translate the financial statements in the comparable prior-year period to determine what the current-period U.S. dollar operating results would have been if the
currency exchange rate had not changed from the comparable prior-year period. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">We believe that the presentation of these <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures, when considered together with our U.S. GAAP financial measures and the reconciliations to the corresponding U.S. GAAP financial measures, helps provide a more complete understanding of
the factors and trends affecting our business than could be obtained absent these disclosures. Because <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures vary among companies, the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT>
financial measures presented in this report may not be comparable to similarly titled measures used by other companies. Our use of these <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures is not meant to be considered in isolation
or as a substitute for any U.S. GAAP financial measure. A limitation of the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures is they do not include all items of income and expense that affect us and have an impact on our U.S. GAAP
reported results. The best way to address this limitation is by evaluating our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures in combination with our U.S. GAAP reported results and carefully evaluating the reconciliations of
U.S. GAAP reported figures to the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures. </P>
</DIV></Center>

</BODY></HTML>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

<td>duration</td>
</tr>
</table></div>
</div></td></tr>
</table>

<FILENAME>Show.js

// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
</TEXT>
